boardgame.name: Liberty
Liberty: The American Revolution 1775-83
boardgame.description: Liberty is a fast-playing game covering the American Revolution from 1775-1783. British, American, and French forces are included and the role of the Indians and Navies is depicted. The unique problems faced by each side become clear in this playable game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is a block game, built on the same foundation as Columbia's much-acclaimed Hammer of the Scots. The card play and wintering rules are similar. The map has switched from area movement to a hex-based map with the traditional movement and terrain rules from other classic Columbia games like Wizard Kings. Leaders, infantry, cavalry, and fleets are all represented._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;CONTENTS_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 50 wooden blocks (20mm)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Labels_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 11 x 34 map of Colonial America_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 25 cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Rules_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 4 Dice_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;(from Columbia's web site _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; user's description)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: In excellent condition, played about 6-7 times, so the cards are beginning to fray and split abit about the edges. They can be ordered new from Columbia Games for 5.00, but they will fall apart within a couple of plays, because of relatively poor quality. The game is now only available new through Columbia Games and they want $49.99 for it. This copy is _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;gently used_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; for $15.00 less. Shipment by FedEx Ground, with all Internet Tracking information provided.
